name: calculate_average
description: Calculates the arithmetic mean of a list of numbers with optional features such as weighted average, outlier exclusion, and result rounding.

numbers.description: The list of numbers to calculate the average for.

weights.description: Optional weights for each number to calculate a weighted average. Must match the length of 'numbers'.

exclude_outliers.description: Whether to exclude statistical outliers from the list of numbers before calculating the average. Defaults to false.

rounding.description: The number of decimal places to round the result to. Defaults to 2.
